title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added new documentation for user offboarding in enterprise, covering processes for Enterprise Managed Users and personal accounts.
Updated guides for removing members from enterprise and organizations with detailed steps and effects.
Introduced documentation for configuring multiple data disks on GitHub Enterprise Server to host MySQL and repositories.
Updated changelog with entries for offboarding content and Copilot custom instructions support.
summary:
- Added new documentation for user offboarding in enterprise, covering processes for Enterprise Managed Users and personal accounts.
- Updated guides for removing members from enterprise and organizations with detailed steps and effects.
- Introduced documentation for configuring multiple data disks on GitHub Enterprise Server to host MySQL and repositories.
- Updated changelog with entries for offboarding content and Copilot custom instructions support.
generated_title: Add user offboarding docs and multiple data disks support for GHES

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added new documentation for user offboarding in enterprise, covering processes for Enterprise Managed Users and personal accounts.
- Updated guides for removing members from enterprise and organizations with detailed steps and effects.
- Introduced documentation for configuring multiple data disks on GitHub Enterprise Server to host MySQL and repositories.
- Updated changelog with entries for offboarding content and Copilot custom instructions support.

### Title
Add user offboarding docs and multiple data disks support for GHES
